lead_paragraph: The avian influenza strain, which attacked a commercial turkey flock, was different from the main strain reported last year.

headline.print_headline: Avian Flu Confirmed in Indiana Turkey Flock
headline.main: Bird Flu Outbreak Confirmed in Indiana

snippet: The avian influenza strain, which attacked a commercial turkey flock, was different from the main strain reported last year.
abstract: Department of Agriculture confirms that outbreak of avian influenza has hit commercial flock of turkeys in Indiana.
